scripts.build: tsc && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.join('src','db','queries');const dest=path.join('dist','db','queries');if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});for (const entry of fs.readdirSync(src)){fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src,entry), path.join(dest,entry));}}"
